Energy Law Committeeall In light of the opening of the energy industry the Mexican Bar Association has been asked by different sectors to create the Energy Law Committee I am pleased toinform you that I have been asked to chair such committee As part of our endevors we will be involved in the upcoming reforms to the energy industry Very truly yours Rogelio LopezVelarde Lopez Velarde Heftye Abogados Guillermo Gonzalez Camarena No Piso Col Santa Fe Centro de Ciudad Mexico DF Telephone Dir Fax email wwwlopezvelardeheftyeabogadoscom The information contained herein may be confidential andor privileged This information is intended to be reviewed only by the individual or the entity to which is addressed If the reader of this email message is not the intended recipient or a representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email message or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email message in error please immediately notify the sender and delete this communication from your system

New Dialing Number for MexicoDear all Please note that effective tomorrow the area codes to dial into Mexico have changed To dial into Mexico City the area code will follow the country code The eightdigit number will follow Our main telephone number will be as follows My direct line will be as follows Our fax number New area codes will become effective for other cities If you need additional information on city codes or dialing instructions you may visit wwwcofetelgobmx Very truly yours Rogelio LpezVelarde Lpez Velarde Heftye Abogados Guillermo Gonzlez Camarena No Piso ColCentro de Ciudad Santa Fe Telfono Fax email wwwlopezvelardeheftyeabogadoscom The information contained herein may be confidential and or privileged This information is intended to be reviewed only by the individual or the entity to which is addressed If the reader of this email message is not the intended recipient you are herebynotified that any review dissemination or copying of this email message or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email message in error please immediately notify the sender and delete this communication from your system

CRE Resolution Encouraging the Use of Financially Settled Commodity Derivatives Transactions For Natural Gas Prices August MEMORANDUM VIA EMAIL To Steven Van Hooser Esq Enron Capital Trade Resources Shari Stack Esq Sara Shackleton Esq From Rogelio LpezVelarde Sean McCoy Re CRE Resolution Encouraging the Use of Financially Settled Commodit y Derivatives Transactions For Natural Gas Prices The Energy Regulatory Commission Comisin Reguladora de Energa CRE published last Wednesday in the Federal Register a resolution by means of which the CRE encourages the use of financially settled commodity derivativ es transactions Financial Instruments to hedge the risk of the natur al gas price variations in Mexico the CRE Resolution Overthecounter F inancial Instruments transactions are being enticed by the CRE in light of the surge of natural gas prices It is expected that such derivatives market will be expanded to other type of energy commodities such as electric power Essentially the CRE is encouraging the use of Financial Instruments by giving a discount of the price index applicable for the month of August The CRE Resolution provides in general terms that The Mexican Users that are able to sign a Financial Instrument with PemexGas y Petroqumica Bsica PGPB or with any third party be fore September covering commodity prices fluctuations for the period of September thru February will benefit from a factor of at least which will be applied to the price of reference ie US Dollars per MMBtu which results in a price of US Dollars per MMBtu only during the month of August the Discount Factor Mexicos Local Distribution Companies LDCs that have contracted Financial Instruments for their clients shall passthrough to th e Users the benefits resulting from the Discount Factor only if such end use rs have previously agreed upon the rendering of such services Needless to say the price determination for the period of September thru February will be freely agreed upon between sell er of the Financial Instruments and the User or the LDC as the case may be Very truly yours RLVJCCSMC HjccVARIOSFuturos GasMM Futuros Gasdoc Domestic natural gas prices in Mexico are indexed to a liquid market in South Texas Such index prices have increased in during the period of MayJune and in from JanuaryJune As defined in the Natural Gas Regulations User shall mean eithe r a marketer or an end user headerhtm
